results.raw_content:
Zaidtek Electronic Technology (Xiamen) Co. Ltd.
Computers and Electronics Manufacturing
About us
Zaidtek Electronic Technology (Xiamen) Co., Ltd. is a specialized manufacturer of Tablet PCs and PC peripherals such as mice,keyboards,USB Hubs,and Web Cameras.
The factory that is located in Xiamen city,Haicang District covers an area of 50000 square meters and is equipped with advanced manufacturing facilities. The Current staff is 500 workers and 15 R&D Engineers.
Giving top priority to quality we have established an advanced quality control system strictly following the ISO9000:2008 standard. Our products comply with CE,FCC,UL,TUV & ROHS.
By constantly improving in R&D,quality and service we have built long term customer relationships with well-known companies. Being a business based on customer satisfaction we are constantly focusing on high quality,timly delivery,excellent services and competitive price. We warmly welcome you to join us and build a prosperous business relationship together.

Max Capacity: Sold Out - Join DICE East May 24 & 25 in Virginia
Demand is skyrocketing for all things data centers. DICE Construction, Design & Development Series East on February 9 is officially sold out. But, don't worry, we have some good news for you...
While you still can, secure your early bird ticket to DICE East: A National Two-Day Data Center Event to be hosted in Virginia on May 24 & 25!
View the early lineup of 35+ speakers and register today here: https://www.bisnow.com/events/virginia/data-center/dice-east-a-national-two-day-data-center-event-8119
Event Host
Quantum Park
Quantum Park is a Class A, amenity-rich facility that provides today’s leading companies and government agencies maximum security, flexibility and power on a controlled 135.7 acre site situated north of the Dulles Greenway on the Loudoun County Parkway.
Quantum Park presents tenants with a unique scalable leasing opportunity with a speed-to-market capability that is not currently available on any other development site or office park. Strategically located in Loudoun County – home to the largest Internet exchange point in the world, and one of the most revered counties in the nation – Quantum Park is powering the future of enterprise in a premier setting like no other in the world.
Speakers and Panels
The Buildout of Mega Campuses in Northern Virginia:

Quantum Park 22001 Loudoun County Parkway Ashburn, VA 20147 Building: Building E-2, 4th Floor
Parking Information:
Free Visitor Parking is located at the front of the complex located off Loudoun County Parkway
Agenda
Why You Can't Miss This Data Center Conference
What You'll Learn At This Data Center Event:
How You'll Do More Business:
There is no slowdown in this industry. Learn about the trends, opportunities, and challenges ahead to position yourself to make the right business decisions and expand your network.
Who You’ll Network With In CRE:
Owners, providers, brokers, investors, engineers, lawyers, CEOs, vice president of design and construction, heads of acquisitions, directors of site selection, end-users, and more commercial real estate decision-makers.
Why You Should Attend:
To learn how East Coast markets are evolving to meet today's end-user and colocation data center requirements.
For questions, or interest in becoming a speaker or sponsor, please email our global director, data centers, Adam Knobloch at adam.knobloch@bisnow.com

results.title: Zaidtek Electronic Technology (Xiamen) Co.,Ltd.
results.content: Established in September, 2006, Zaidtek Electronic Technology (Xiamen) Co.,Ltd. located in Xinyang industrial zone, Haicang district, Xiamen, Fujian, China.It covers an area of more than 50,000 m 2 .From the very beginning, we mainly produce mouse, keyboards, usb hubs etc.computer peripherals.
results.raw_content:
ABOUT US
Established in September, 2006, Zaidtek Electronic Technology (Xiamen) Co.,Ltd. located in Xinyang industrial zone, Haicang district, Xiamen, Fujian, China.It covers an area of more than 50,000 m 2
.From the very beginning, we mainly produce mouse, keyboards, usb hubs etc.computer peripherals. Products got CE, FCC, UL, RoHS, REACH etc.international certificates, are exported to USA, South America, Europe, south Korea and etc. We have established long term partnership with internationalsupermarkets (Walmart, carrefour, metro, Lidl…) and famous electronic brands:
LG, Trust, Dixons and etc.
Factory have two production buildings, 5 electronic products assembly lines,more than 200 employees, and each production line have output capacity of8,000pcs mouse, 5,000pcs keyboards.
Factory passed ISO 9001：2015 quality system and ISO 14001：2015 environment system authentications. And passed BSCI factory audit. We implemented the spirit of “quality management, starting from the beginning”throughout the whole manufacturing process, from raw material procurement,IQC inspection, to online inspection, IQC inspection, we make sure of strict control, interlocking, ensure product quality and won customers’ appreciations.
February, 2020, under the epidemic situation, we fast react, established Medical Instrument B.U., invested mask and infrared thermometers production facilities, and modify the dust-free workshop, reach 0.3 million dust-free grade, and 0.1 million dust-free grade workshop is under construction. Till now, we have 16 disposable medical mask production lines with output capability of 1.5million pieces daily and KN95 fast-speed machine of 0.3 million pieces daily output. We now have around 100 employees in mask workshop. We obtained Grade 2 medical instrument business license, production license, with disposable medical mask and infrared thermometers product registration. We also established ISO 13485 medical instrument quality system, and under factory audit, estimated to gain the ISO certificate in June. We apply CE certificates, FDA listed, and EUA emergency authorization with test reports. Our product have no problem in Customs Declaration and Clearance.
HOME  |  ABOUT US  |  PRODUCTS  |  QUALIFICATION  |  EQUIPMENT LINE  |  NEWS  |  FEEDBACK  |  CONTACT US
Address: No. 29-2 XinLe Road, Xinyang Street, Haicang District, Xiamen  Phone: +86 592–6881618      +86 18064467556Email: sales@zaidtek.com

Electronic Technology

results.title: Home - EIT
results.content: We offer EMS to customers in the most widely varied sectors for which we possess the required certifications. Our customers benefit from our expertise in the areas of Healthcare & Life Sciences, Telecommunications, Industrial Electronics, EV Charging, Automotive, Rail Technology, Data Processing Technology, Aerospace & Defense, Measurement Technology and miscellaneous consumer goods.
results.raw_content:
Together to the top of EMS worldwide
Our company for Electronic Manufacturing & Engineering Services, founded in 1977, is taking the next step into the future together with Zollner Elektronik AG. With immediate effect, EIT is now a part of the Zollner Group of companies, Europe’s market leader among electronics service providers.
About us
Comprehensive spectrum of services in the EMS sector
EIT possesses more than four decades of EMS experience in the development and support of products with medium to high-level technologies from the most widely varied sectors. We support you with many years of engineering expertise from the design and prototype phases and throughout the entire life cycle of your products.
Decisive to us are personal service and first class support along with the financial stability and available capacity to sustain your growth. Through the takeover by Zollner, we are able to vastly expand our spectrum of services as well as expand our customer support in all critical markets to offer comprehensive, innovative EMS solutions.
Services
Sectors
We offer EMS to customers in the most widely varied sectors for which we possess the required certifications. Our customers benefit from our expertise in the areas of Healthcare & Life Sciences, Telecommunications, Industrial Electronics, EV Charging, Automotive, Rail Technology, Data Processing Technology, Aerospace & Defense, Measurement Technology and miscellaneous consumer goods.
Careers
For us, people are our main focus. This applies as well to our customers as to our employees because challenges can only be mastered as a team. Over 13,000 employees around the globe contribute to the success of the Zollner group. We are always on the lookout for personalities, who would like to bring in their expertise and ideas and pursue new pathways. Become part of our success story today!
Job Vacancies Virginia Job Vacancies Salem

Further information can be found in our privacy policy.
Activating this video external content and cookies from Vimeo are loaded.

Further information can be found in our privacy policy.
News
In the following press release, Governor Glenn Youngkin announces our multi-location investment – with various comments with regard to the expansion. The investment both to expand Zollner's manufacturing operations in the Danville-Pittsylvania County Regional Industrial Facility Authority-owned Cyber Park and the  expansion of the U.S. headquarters facility in Loudoun County will create 100 new jobs.
Press Release

Jones Lang LaSalle was formed by the merger of Jones Lang Wootton, a British firm with origins dating back to 1783, and LaSalle Partners, an American company formed from a predecessor launched in 1968. Telos is a leading provider of advanced technology solutions that empower and protect the world's most demanding enterprises. Our customers include military, intelligence, and civilian agencies of the federal government and NATO allies around the world. Our goal is to secure their strategic and tactical systems in order to ensure the success of their missions. Our innovations in secure solutions range from unified communications and secure mobile networks to global identity management and information assurance. Whether guarding communications, systems, networks, or access to physical and logical resources, Telos solutions protect what is most important in today's security-conscious enterprises.

Zippia Score 4.4

The company offers solutions in areas such as cyber security which includes continuous monitoring, certification and accreditation, supply chain management, data at rest, certification and accreditation training, and data loss protection; cloud-based solutions, including virtual desktop infrastructure, migration, environment assessment, integration, and security services; and mobility solutions which include security and management, custom mobile security solutions, ID blue button application, enterprise tablet bundle, and productivity solutions. The company also provides network convergence solutions such as secure mobility, network management and monitoring, continuous security testing, WAN optimization and QoS, unified communications, IPv6, wireless, campus LAN infrastructure, and data center network infrastructure; application development which includes agile development, architectural integration, communications module, and security module; and simulation and training, including immersive, wearable device integration, commercial and community outreach, and web-based training services. Intelligent Decisions was founded in 1988 and is based in Ashburn, Virginia.

Zippia Score 4.4
